meanings.definition: Having a lively or energetic quality.
meanings.sent1: The zingy music at the party got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: She wore a zingy yellow dress that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The zingy puppy chased its tail in circles, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His zingy personality lit up the room like a burst of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The zingy colors of the painting made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: Sharp or pungent in taste or smell.
meanings.sent1: The zingy salsa had a spicy kick that made my mouth tingle.
meanings.sent2: The chef added a zingy touch of lemon to the dish for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The zingy scent of the flowers tickled her nose as she walked by.
meanings.sent4: The zingy taste of the vinegar made her lips pucker in surprise.
meanings.sent5: The zingy aroma of the spices filled the kitchen with warmth and flavor.

meanings.sent1: Her zingy enthusiasm for the project inspired the team to work harder.
meanings.sent2: The zingy performance of the band energized the crowd at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The zingy dance moves of the kids brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The zingy spirit of the event lifted everyone's mood and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The zingy laughter of the children echoed through the playground, full of joy.
